懷.definition: bosom; heart; mind; to think of; to harbor in one's mind; to conceive (a child)

懷仁堂.definition: Huairen Hall or Huairentang, a building inside Zhongnanhai 中南海[Zhong1 nan2 hai3], used as the main meeting place of the Politburo of the CCP

懷來.definition: Huailai county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei

懷來縣.definition: Huailai county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei

懷化.definition: see 懷化市|怀化市[Huai2hua4 Shi4]

懷化市.definition: Huaihua, prefecture-level city in Hunan Province 湖南省[Hu2nan2 Sheng3]

懷古.definition: to recall the past; to cherish the memory of past events; to reminisce; nostalgic

懷孕.definition: pregnant; to have conceived; gestation; pregnancy

懷安.definition: Huai'an county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei

懷安縣.definition: Huai'an county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei

懷寧.definition: Huaining, a county in Anqing 安慶|安庆[An1qing4], Anhui

懷寧縣.definition: Huaining, a county in Anqing 安慶|安庆[An1qing4], Anhui

懷念.definition: to cherish the memory of; to think of; to reminisce

懷恨.definition: to feel hatred; to harbor a grudge

懷才不遇.definition: to have talent but no opportunity (idiom); to be an unrecognized talent

懷抱.definition: to hug; to cherish; within the bosom (of the family); to embrace (also fig. an ideal, aspiration etc)

懷有.definition: to have in one's person (feelings, talent etc)

懷柔縣.definition: former Huairou county, now Huairou rural district of Beijing

懷氏虎鶇.definition: (bird species of China) White's thrush (Zoothera aurea)

懷特島.definition: Isle of Wight, island off the south coast of England

懷璧其罪.definition: lit. treasuring a jade ring becomes a crime (idiom); to get into trouble on account of a cherished item; fig. A person's talent will arouse the envy of others.

懷疑.definition: to doubt (sth); to be skeptical of; to have one's doubts; to harbor suspicions; to suspect that

懷祿.definition: to yearn for a high official position

懷胎.definition: to become pregnant; to carry a child in the womb

懷遠.definition: Huaiyuan, a county in Bengbu 蚌埠[Beng4bu4], Anhui

懷遠縣.definition: Huaiyuan, a county in Bengbu 蚌埠[Beng4bu4], Anhui

懷集.definition: Huaiji county in Zhaoqing 肇慶|肇庆[Zhao4 qing4], Guangdong

懷集縣.definition: Huaiji county in Zhaoqing 肇慶|肇庆[Zhao4 qing4], Guangdong
